body: Amanda, I also got a null brep in your new files.  I think you get a "null brep" because it is not included in your Rhino file.  I tired to infer what you meant from your description and the context surface is written into the IDF correctly: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/QEp1*ekLQe80maSZig5xScvzOXvEcTbb*1kFksr7kmIoM8KtHUCQb-gFlvkUhzpdDmp9FhTdvFfVjbYnLhzi24zaCk26pUbA/CorrectContext.JPG) Hope this helps and, if we are far from understanding your error, please give us more information. -Chris
